title: How to Survive If You Were Part of the Tech Layoffs
description: Big Tech has gotten much smaller over the past few months. If you got a pink slip and you’re planning your next move, we have tips to help.

title: News Publishers Are Wary of the Microsoft Bing Chatbot’s Media Diet
description: Microsoft’s new search interface can serve up key information from articles, removing the need to click—and potentially undermining media business models.
